title: Power Upped Sunscreen
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Hmm~.... I think this much is good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, are you applying sunscreen before practice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hehehe, Riko-chan told me to. She said that I have to keep applying it regularly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Even so, being able to follow that routine is great, You-san. Then, I have one more thing for you….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeh!? I-, if I have to apply more stuff regularly, I don’t know if I can remember them all….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Don’t worry. It’s just a simple matter of changing what you usually use<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Since you’re already applying sunscreen to your face, why not change your lipstick to a sunscreen infused one too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh!? There are lipsticks with sunscreen!? Won’t that taste weird….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, there’s no need to worry. Also, do try my or Ruby’s one later. Both of them have a nice fragrance, so I’m sure you will like them, You-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
